inclusion.criterion: Patient and/or parents/guardian signed informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with cough or shortness of breath
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Skin lesions precluding attachment of sensors

notes: 39-year-old man with cough and shortness of breath, history of asthma, using ICS and fluticasone/salmeterol.
